mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.biz_tab_name , t1.biz_type , t1.biz_inf_id , t1.biz_inf_name , t1.biz_task_type , t1.pro_instance_id , t1.start_pro_userid , t1.pro_instance_state , t1.task_state , t1.validate_state , t1.owner_id , t1.org_id , t1.create_time , t1.modify_time , t1.create_by , t1.modify_by , t1.remark , t1.is_hidden , t1.biz_inf_no , t1.over_time , t1.remind_time from jbpm4_biz_tab t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update jbpm4_biz_tab t1 set t1.biz_tab_name =#{dto.bizTabName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.biz_type =#{dto.bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.biz_inf_id =#{dto.bizInfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.biz_inf_name =#{dto.bizInfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.biz_task_type =#{dto.bizTaskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.pro_instance_id =#{dto.proInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.start_pro_userid =#{dto.startProUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.pro_instance_state =#{dto.proInstanceState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.task_state =#{dto.taskState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.validate_state ='1', t1.owner_id =#{dto.ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.org_id =#{dto.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.create_time =#{dto.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.modify_time =#{dto.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.create_by =#{dto.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.modify_by =#{dto.modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.remark =#{dto.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.is_hidden =#{dto.isHidden,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.biz_inf_no =#{dto.bizInfNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.over_time =#{dto.overTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.remind_time =#{dto.remindTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from jbpm4_biz_tab where id in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update jbpm4_biz_tab t1 set t1.valid='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
mapper.select: SELECT a.pro_instance_id FROM jbpm4_biz_tab a WHERE a.biz_type = #{bizType} AND a.biz_inf_no = #{orderNum} ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT count(1) FROM jbpm4_biz_tab a WHERE a.BIZ_INF_ID = #{orderId} AND a.BIZ_TYPE = #{bizType} AND a.IS_OVER = 0
